attributes.action: oppose the appointment of Tony Blair as the UK's candidate for election to the post of President of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is our considered opinion that Mr Tony Blair is unfit and unworthy to be the first President of the European Union and that the British Government should act honourably by blocking his candidature.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
